decisions.description: Confirm if the manual renewal action can run based on the Case Data
decisions.name: COMM_Decision_ConfirmActionAvailability
decisions.label: Confirm Action Availability

rules.name: COMM_Outcome_Confirmed
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND 2 AND ( 3 OR ( 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7 ) )
rules.label: Confirmed

Flow.description: This flow gives the possibility to renew a subscription in order to efficiently manage the company subscriptions.

formulas.description: Get real Subscription Periodicity after renewal if a Periodicity Change occurred.
formulas.name: COMM_Formula_SubscriptionGetRealPeriodicity

formulas.description: Get real Subscription Price after renewal if a Periodicity Change occurred.
formulas.name: COMM_Formula_SubscriptionGetRealPrice

formulas.description: Get real Subscription Product after renewal if a Periodicity Change occurred.
formulas.name: COMM_Formula_SubscriptionGetRealProduct

formulas.description: Calculate the Subscription End Date after renewal.
formulas.name: COMM_Formula_SubscriptionNewEndDate

formulas.description: Formula to retrieve Subscription's Airport. If Value Field is empty retrieve airport from Subscription's Product
formulas.name: COMM_SubscriptionAirportFormula

formulas.description: Formula to obtain the Contact Id that the Case will be associated with. Case will be associated with User's Contact, if he doesn't have one then assign it to Subscription's Contact.
formulas.name: COMM_Variable_ContactId

Flow.label: COMM: Subscription Renewal

recordLookups.description: Get Case Record Type: Manual Renewal
recordLookups.name: COMM_Get_CaseRecordTypeManualRenewal
recordLookups.label: Get Case Record Type: Manual Renewal

fields.name: COMM_DisplayText_SubscriptionManualRenewalNotPermitted
fields.fieldText: {!$Label.COMM_SUBSCRIPTION_NOTPERMITTEDWARNING}
